detail_desc: Sleeveless jumpsuit in a crêpe weave with a frill-trimmed V-neck, concealed silicone trim at the top. and shoulder straps. Concealed zip at the back, side pockets and wide elastication at the sides of the back.
Shorts in softly draping denim made from a Tencel™ lyocell blend. High, frill-trimmed waist with covered elastication, and pockets in the side seams.
Calf-length culottes in washed, lightweight denim. High paper bag waist with wide elastication and a small frill trim, side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Thong briefs in microfibre with a low waist, lined gusset and narrow elastic strap at the sides.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with a ribbed neckline and long sleeves.
V-neck dress in a viscose weave with buttons down the front, a detachable tie belt at the waist and long sleeves.
Wide, round-necked blouse in a cotton weave with embroidery, partially concealed buttons down the front and long, wide, cuffed balloon sleeves with embroidery.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short-sleeved shirt in a printed viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem with short slits in the sides.
Wide jersey vest top with a rounded hem.
Fitted body in ribbed jersey with a square neckline, short sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Wrapover hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a high paper bag waist, pleats at the front and a detachable tie belt. Zip fly with a hook-and-eye fastening, side pockets and wide, tapered legs.

H&M SUPPORTS WWF. All-in-one suit in soft, patterned organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, fake pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Lightly brushed inside.

Coat in felted fabric containing some wool with a high stand-up collar. Wrapover front with concealed press-studs, a tie-belt at the side with D-rings and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Printed swimming trunks with an elasticated, drawstring waist and lined front.

Short, off-the-shoulder dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Wide, elasticated flounce at the top that continues over the arms, a concealed zip in one side and a flare to the hem. Jersey lining.

Strapless balconette bras in a soft cotton blend with lace details and underwired, padded cups that lift and shape. Silicone trim at the hem and a fastening at the back with three pairs of hooks and eyes.
Short-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a round neck and button placket.
Ankle-length jeggings in soft, stretch denim with worn details. Extra-high waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and skinny legs.
Short-sleeved nursing tops in organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Imitation leather sandals with cork midsoles, straps with hook and loop fastenings and a loop at the back. Imitation suede linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a fake fly, fake welt back pockets and gently tapered legs with creases. Wide jersey ribbing at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
Reversible poncho in a soft fine knit with buttons and a fringed hem. Size 70x170 cm.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline in a contrasting colour and a gently rounded hem.
Pleated, calf-length skirt in woven fabric with a high, elasticated waist. Unlined.
5-pocket, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and slim legs. Decorative seams at the knees, down the legs and at the hems.
Sleeveless dress in sequined tulle with a concealed zip at the back, seam at the waist and flared skirt in a double layer of tulle. Jersey lining.
Straight-style top in an airy rib knit with a wide neckline, low dropped shoulders, short sleeves and slits in the sides.

Set with a top, leggings and hairband in soft jersey. Gently flared top with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and long sleeves. Leggings with covered elastication at the waist. Stretchy hairband with a knot detail at the front.

Blouse in a viscose and cotton weave with a round neckline and pin-tucks and inset lace trims at the top and on the sleeves. Opening with a covered button at the back of the neck, a gathered yoke, long balloon sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a flared to the hem.
Short-sleeved dress in soft cotton jersey with a hood, print motif, seam at the hips and gently flared skirt.
Velour boots with lacing at the front, a zip in one side and a loop at the back. Pile linings and insoles and chunky rubber soles.
Jeans in washed, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets. Slim legs with narrow hems.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a decorative bow at the neck and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Ankle-length jeans in washed cotton denim. High, elasticated paper bag waist with a small frill trim, two buttons, a zip fly, side and back pockets, and tapered legs.
Cardigan in a loose bouclé knit with low dropped shoulders, long, wide sleeves and front patch pockets. No buttons.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with a low-cut neckline front and back and wide shoulder straps. No fasteners.
Cotton poplin shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a back pocket.
Top in soft, printed jersey with appliqués on the front, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and fringing at the hem.
Short, fitted skirt in ribbed jersey with an elasticated waist.
Short dress in ribbed jersey with 3/4-length sleeves, smooth jersey panels at the sides, a seam at the waist and a gently bell-shaped skirt. Unlined.
Sleeveless top in airy, tiered chiffon with a raw-edge neckline and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Jacquard-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Leather card holder with four card compartments and one note compartment. Size 7x9.5 cm.

Jumper in fine-knit cotton with a rounded, woven collar, an opening with a button at the back of the neck, and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Longer, gently rounded layer in a cotton weave at the hem.
Gloves in soft fleece. Ribbed cuffs with a glittery stripe at the top.

Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Pockets in the side seams, a fake welt back pocket and straight legs with creases front and back and stripes down the sides.

Straight-cut, loose-fitting dress in a sequined weave made from recycled polyester. V-neck and wide shoulder straps decorated with ties that can be fastened into bows. Concealed zip in one side made partly from recycled polyester. Recycled polyester lining.
Sleeveless V-neck top in soft viscose jersey with a rounded hem and slits in the sides.
Dress in patterned cotton jersey with elastication and a wide flounce at the top that continues over the shoulders. Narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.
Fitted top in a fine-knit viscose blend with a round neckline and long sleeves.
Necklace of three thin metal chains in various designs. One chain decorated with a metal bead and one with a rod-shaped pendant. Adjustable length 42-50 cm.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a sewn-in wrapover at the front and concealed zip in one side. Gathered flounce at the front that continues around the hem. Lined.
High-waisted shorts in woven fabric with a wide, detachable tie belt, pleats at the front, a zip fly with hook-and-eye fasteners and side pockets.

Short, fitted pencil skirt in woven fabric with a high waist, narrow, detachable belt and a concealed zip at the back. Lined. The polyester content of the outer fabric is partly recycled. The polyester content of the lining is recycled.
Short coat in faux fur with wide notch lapels, concealed hook-and-eye fasteners at the front, welt side pockets and an inner pocket. Lined.
Soft, non-wired bra that gives the bust a natural shape and light support. Microfibre with laser-cut edges, narrow adjustable shoulder straps and hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Fully lined patterned swimsuit with crossover shoulder straps and frills at the front that continue over the shoulders.
Double-layered hat in fine-knit merino wool with a small imitation suede appliqué at the hem.
Hi-tops with a lightly padded edge and tongue and lacing at the front. Leather linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.

Wide, V-neck tunic in a viscose weave with a stand-up collar and ties at the neck. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with a drawstring and flounce at the cuffs, and seams with flounces in the lower section.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in a soft wool blend with a V-neck, a jacquard-knit front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft chenille rib knit in a wide, slightly boxy style with low dropped shoulders and wide ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Dress in sweatshirt material with a stand-up collar and zip at the top in a straight, relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit, print-patterned cotton with buttons down the front, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal hoop earrings in various sizes and designs. Diameter from 3 cm to 8.5 cm.
Fine-knit jumper in cotton slub yarn with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fully lined, printed swimsuit with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.
Large plastic earrings with flower-shaped sequin and bead decorations. Length 9.5 cm.
Cargo trousers in crisp cotton poplin with a zip fly and button, and front, back and leg pockets, all with a flap and button. Tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.
Fitted top in stretch organic cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Pool shoes with a wide strap and moulded insoles in leather. Rubber soles.
Short top in crocheted cotton with a square neckline with a drawstring at the front, short, scallop-trimmed sleeves and a scalloped trim at the hem.
Pyjama bottoms in soft viscose jersey with an elasticated, drawstring waist and wide, straight legs with lace-trimmed hems.
Ankle-length trousers in a viscose weave. Covered elastication at the waist with a small frill trim and a decorative bow with tassels. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
